Along the way, they will be asked questions, given directions, and faced with puzzles based on their favorite fairy tales.  This sequel to the phenomenally popular Mixed-Up Mother Goose is a delightful way for children to expand their reading, logic, and problem-solving skills. {"title": "iPitch", "title_search": "ipitch", "title_keyword": "ipitch", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/ipitch/", "summary": "The classic game of cutthroat “Pitch”, also known as “Setback” brought to the iPhone.  Pitch is a strategy based trick-taking card game where each player attempts to get to the winning score (typically 7, 11 or 21) by winning points.  Each player “bids” on the number of points they think they could win (either 2, 3 or 4).  The winning bidder then chooses the trump suit for the round.  The available points that may be won for a round are High, Low, Jack of trump and Game.  Key features of “iPitch”:  1. Simple, intuitive gameplay 2. Three different computer skill levels to play against 3. Personalize the computer players by choosing pictures from your picture library 4. Adjustable game play speed 5. Arrange the cards in your hand 6. {"title": "Free Word Warp", "title_search": "free word warp", "title_keyword": "free word warp", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/free-word-warp/", "summary": "“Word Warp is my first go-to game when I find myself out of the house and not doing anything. Every time you see me sitting on the train or in a waiting room I am listening to music and playing some Word Warp”  - AppCraver.com “Its sheer simplicity combined with its quick playability makes it great to play when I have a few minutes of downtime. “ -  Examiner.com Word game fans rejoice!  If you’ve enjoyed countless hours playing games like TextTwist, Word Scramble, Jumble, Boggle, or Scrabble, then Word Warp is the game for you! Similar to Text Twist, Word Warp is a challenging anagram type of word game in which you try to form as many words as you can out of the six letters you are given before time runs out.  You will receive points for each correct word you come up with, but in order to advance to the next level you must come up with at least one word that uses all six letters. Stumped?  Word Warp has a Warp Button that will rearrange the letters for you so you may recognize some words you previously missed.  There is also an option to change the allotted game time to give yourself more time - or make it more challenging. Once the level is completed, you are given the list of all the possible words and you can tap any of the words to see its definition. So if you want a fun and addicting game that keeps your brain sharp and builds your vocabulary at the same time, then definitely give Word Warp a try! Free Word Warp is a fully-featured, but ad-supported version of Word Warp. If you like Free Word Warp, but prefer it without ads, you can purchase Word Warp without ads from the App Store. {"title": "iSoccer Backstreet", "title_search": "isoccer backstreet", "title_keyword": "isoccer backstreet", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/isoccer-backstreet/", "summary": "Reviews: - “Artificial Life’s got itself a winner with iSoccer… it’s a fun little game that soccer fans should enjoy highly.” (4/5) - iPhonetunes.net - “One of the best freestyle game to ever touch the App Store.” - AppChatter - “A game that’s jam-packed with a good variety of stuff to do so it’s hard to get bored.” - Frapstr, The Podium Network - “If you are tired of playing the same old soccer game, give iSoccer Backstreet a try.” - appadvice - “Game is worth buying.” (4.8/5) - iphonetech78.wordpress.com Play iSoccer Backstreet™ and put your body-balancing and juggling skills to the ultimate test! iSoccer Backstreet takes soccer out of the grassy fields and into the streets. Players can battle it out by performing amazing body balancing and dribbling tricks using different parts of their body while following complex rhythm patterns. Players’ shooting skills will also be put to the test challenging both your aim and strength. Play now and see what it’s like to be an iSoccer Backstreet pro! Game features: - Nine diverse levels will put your dribbling, shooting and memorization skills to the test! - More than a dozen freestyle tricks including the Magellan, Back Spin Juggle and Abbas ATW are available to master, requiring speedy reaction and perfect coordination. - Tilt your iPhone to perform body-balancing stalls, swipe different commands on the screen to perform special tricks, and much more! - Rebel against authority and destroy your city in the unique Destroyer Mode, featuring two different playing styles. - Choose from six different avatars and customize them to your liking utilizing an array of unique outfits including jerseys, shorts, foot gear and more. - Realistic movements and actions obtained from real life soccer players produce a fluid and lifelike gaming experience. - Practice mode offers players the option to choose their own game mode, time limit, and location. - Experience a world of rich 3D graphics in a variety of outdoor locations including the City Streets, Backstreet, Docks and more! - Heart pumping sounds will make you feel like you’re really in the game! {"title": "WarMen", "title_search": "warmen", "title_keyword": "warmen", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/warmen/", "summary": "In year 2013 civil unrest across the globe pushes world leaders to merge the Police and Military into one force: Department of Control. Opposing it, is the resistance, composed out of former military members that refused to join the Department. Marco is one of them, and the game tells his story. We join Marco as he is deployed on a mission to destroy scrambler devices placed around the city. While creating this game we wanted to reflect realism of an urban warfare, therefore the game is all about taking cover behind walls and other obstacles. Game features: - take Cover behind obstacles and hunt your enemies down. - feel the fast-paced action and get carried away by the game's plot. - explore 5 levels of pure unrefined fun. - make good use of your handy UZI and stinger missiles. - enjoy the intuitive controls. - experience the dynamically lighted 3d environment. - become blown away by an engine that pushes iPhone capabilities to the edge. For fans of tactical shooters. Shooting and view control: - to shoot tap the screen. - to look around touch the screen and slide. Movement: - to move press forward. - when you need to reload press "reload" on the menu. - you can take cover and duck by pressing "crouch". - if you want to change your weapon press "swap". - to access the in-game menu press the cog icon. Gameplay footage: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pEPnjzsFjLs WHAT OTHERS SAY: pocketgamer.co.uk “You know what you are getting with a title called WarMen – there's just no way it's going to be about virtual horses or mental dexterity. {"title": "Monkey vs Troll", "title_search": "monkey vs troll", "title_keyword": "monkey vs troll", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/monkey-vs-troll/", "summary": "It's simple. It's fun. It's addictive.  You are Monkey, and you've got to get to the other side of the Bridge. However, there's a Troll who doesn't want you to get there.  Troll hates all things which smile. When Troll sees a rose, he stomps on it. Then he breathes fire on it, turning it to ash.  You must guide Monkey safely past Troll, who gets smarter and smarter the further along you go. Troll shoots fireballs at you, which you must dodge to avoid being turned into chimp flambé!  Also, did I mention the lava which jumps up to get you? There's that too.  Yikes!  ---  Revisit the glory days with this ultra-addictive of a classic TI-83 game. Remember sitting through mind-numbing class after class in high school, pretending to be working on your calculator while you were actually playing games that your classmate created during those same classes?  Well, I *was* that classmate. I made a handful of games for the TI-83, spawning a love of programming that would end up being a career. This one (originally titled "The Bridge") was my personal favorite. It was inspired by a certain sequence in a classic game we all know and love, a game many of us grew up on.  Try it out and see for yourself!  ---  FEATURES -Insanely addictive gameplay! -Mind-bending action! -Spine-tingling suspense! -Edge of your seat, pants-wetting thrills! -Trolls and Lava and Fireballs, Oh My! -4 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and (unlockable) Frantic! -Unlockable Survival Mode -- see how long you can last! -As you progress through the levels, more color is added to the world. -That feeling, you can only say what it is in French! -That feeling, you can only say what it is in French!", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-09-18", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-128564-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-128564-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["David Blundell (Developer)", "David Blundell (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
